name: Chris Coyier
content: I wish things were different, but it weren't us who changed.

name: Leah Culver
content: We all need friends. We die alone, but we live along men.

name: Steve Jobs
content: Take a gamble that love exists, and do a loving act.

name: Marissa Mayer
content: Don't give up. You're going to get kicked in the teeth. A lot. Learn to take a hit, then pick yourself up off the floor. Resilience is the true key to success.
